aas:langStringTextType.aas:text: Intermediate Datamodel to enable Supplier to provide PCF information for their products according to the preliminary Delegated Act. This model is to be replaced as soon as the Delegated Act is finalized
This attribute contains the values to calculate the PCF values.
encapsulation for pcf values per stage.
This attribute describes the percentage of the absolute PCF value of this component that is attributable to the 'Raw material and preprocessing' stage.
This attribute describes the percentage of the absolute PCF value of this component that is attributable to the 'Main product production' stage.
This attribute describes the percentage of the absolute PCF value of this component that is attributable to the 'Distribution' stage.
This attribute describes the percentage of the absolute PCF value of this component that is attributable to the 'End-Of-Life and recycling' stage.
Which secondary data sources and versions have been used by you or by suppliers (e.g. data bases such as ecoinvent)?

The period of time during which the parent-child relation is valid. This relates to whether a child part can be built into or used in the production of the parent part at a given time. If no validity period is given the relation is considered valid at any point in time.
CO2 relevant metals contained in the product.

Intermediate Datamodel to enable Supplier to provide PCF information for their products according to the preliminary Delegated Act. This model is to be replaced as soon as the Delegated Act is finalized

aas:langStringDefinitionTypeIec61360.aas:text: Intermediate Datamodel to enable Supplier to provide PCF information for their products according to the preliminary Delegated Act. This model is to be replaced as soon as the Delegated Act is finalized
Enter the PCF value of the parent stage measured in the declared unit.
This attribute describes the percentage of the absolute PCF value of this component that is attributable to the 'Raw material and preprocessing' stage.
This attribute describes the percentage of the absolute PCF value of this component that is attributable to the 'Main product production' stage.
This attribute describes the percentage of the absolute PCF value of this component that is attributable to the 'Distribution' stage.
This attribute describes the percentage of the absolute PCF value of this component that is attributable to the 'End-Of-Life and recycling' stage.
This attribute defines the unit of the attribute absPCFValue. It is one of CO2KG/kg OR CO2KG/piece.
Absolute Product Carbon Value.
encapsulation for pcf values per stage.
pcf performance class.
Link to used Carbon Foot Print Study.
This attribute contains the values to calculate the PCF values.
Which secondary data sources and versions have been used by you or by suppliers (e.g. data bases such as ecoinvent)?
Share of primary data in the final PCF. For prospective PCF this shall not be communicated or set "0"

Part ID as assigned by the customer of the part. The customer Part ID identifies the part (as designed)in the customer`s dataspace. The Part ID does not reference a specific instance of a part and thus should not be confused with the serial number or any other instance IDs. If no specific part ID exists a part family ID may be substituted for it.
Data Quality Rating for technological context. Value between 1-5.
Quality Rating for Data in context of geographical product information.
Data quality rating for data in context of time.
Data quality Rating measurement. Value between 1-5. Depending on TechnologicalRepresentativeness[TER], GeographicalRepresentativeness[GER] and TimeRepresentativeness[TIR].

Part ID as assigned by the manufacturer of the part. The Part ID identifies the part (as designed) in the manufacturer`s dataspace. The Part ID does not reference a specific instance of a part and thus should not be confused with the serial number or batch number.
End date of validity period.
Start date and time of validity period.

The period of time during which the parent-child relation is valid. This relates to whether a child part can be built into or used in the production of the parent part at a given time. If no validity period is given the relation is considered valid at any point in time.
Site identifier of the providing Catena-X participant
Legal identifier of the providing Catena-X participant.
Quality parameters of the product.
CO2 relevant metals contained in the product.
